sense.def:
To whine
pomeni spustiti dolg, visok glas, zlasti če je žalosten ali neprijeten.

seg.quote: His dog was whining in pain.
The clattering and whining elevator began to move slowly upwards.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
whines about something
, se na neprijeten način pritožuje zaradi nečesa.

seg.quote: My father never whined about his work.
